mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ta_usage_point_data (point_id,create_time_int, create_time, date_show, hour_show, point_data,point_usage) VALUES (#{pointId},#{createTimeInt},#{createTime}, #{dateShow}, #{hourShow}, #{pointData},#{pointUsage});
mapper.select: select point_id as pointId, create_time_int as createTimeInt, create_time as createTime, date_show as dateShow, hour_show as hourShow, point_data as pointData, point_usage as pointUsage from ta_usage_point_data t where t.point_id = #{point_id} and t.create_time_int = #{create_time_int}
